A tape measure with a built-in laser pointer: The laser pointer can be used to accurately measure distances in a room or outside.
A tape measure with a built-in level: The level can be used to ensure that the tape measure is level when taking measurements.
A tape measure with a built-in magnifying glass: The magnifying glass can be used to read small measurements or to get a closer look at a small detail.
A tape measure with a built-in flashlight: The flashlight can be used to illuminate the area where the tape measure is being used, making it easier to read the measurements.
A tape measure with a built-in ruler: The ruler can be used to measure smaller objects or to take more precise measurements.
